data.name: The Green Light
data.detailed_description:
The Green Light is a single-player first-person mystery set in 1986. A story driven game with an atmospheric environment and narrations. A tale of self-discovery as Gary Baker attempts to save what's left of himself and his family.


The year is 1986, You are a man named Gary Baker a failed sales man who lost his job and the respect of his family. Times are tough and, due to his issues and occupation, Gary has an even worse time than most. Over time these issues bear down on him, shaping his actions, making him seep down to the deep mental darkness. in the busy city of New York lives a man by the name of Benson Blakewell the head of the notorious Blackwell Irish mob family who recruits young kids offering them a better life and wealth in return of work. being broke and not in the right place Gary went through a depressive state forgetting all about his wife Sara and his 17 year old song Jeremy Baker.

after seeing his mother struggle financially Jeremy Baker decides to join Benson Blakewell in hopes of getting rich. the story unfolds when the authorities attempt to arrest Blackwell as he escapes to a village north of Argentina along with Gary Bakers son. Being desperate to get his son back Gary as well as FBI agent helen flanders attempt to achieve the impossible in saving and bring back Jeremy Baker back home.

data.short_description: The Green Light is a single-player first-person mystery set in 1986. A story driven game with an atmospheric environment and narrations. A tale of self-discovery as Gary Baker attempts to save what's left of himself and his family.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 7
  • Processor: intel core i5 4400 / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 3GB
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 15 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Minimum Requirements may cause framedrops.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 3700X / Intel Core i7-7600K
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1660 Super 6GB
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 15 GB available space
